notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: Peng-Xiang Lai designed the study. Han-Yu Zhang collected the plant samples. Han-Yu Zhang performed the antioxidant, antimicrobial, and cytotoxic activity assays. Peng-Xiang Lai carried out the chemical analysis of the essential oil. Han-Yu Zhang and Yang Gao interpreted the obtained data. Han-Yu Zhang wrote the manuscript. All authors read and approved the manuscript.
